EmailTemplate.description: This one is attached to workflow!
EmailTemplate.name: AUTO_Event_Invite(INterview)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Zendesk interview is here!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Details inside about your Zendesk interview
Thankyou for coming along to the Zendesk Workshop!
We hope you enjoyed the evening and found it a really valuable experience! Your interview is happening next week - here are the next steps:
1) If you haven't already, complete your Online Application by Sunday night
Everyone who completes an Online Applications in eligible to be interviewed, so make sure you don't miss the deadline!
2) Confirm you are attending the interview next week
What? {!HS_YP_Attendance__c.HS_Event_Day__c}
Where? {!HS_Event_Day__c.Event_Day_Location__c}
When? {!HS_Event_Day__c.Event_Day_Date__c}
Time? {!HS_Event_Day__c.Event_Day_Time__c}
Important information about the interview
{!HS_Event_Day__c.Event_Day_Summary__c}
Important information about the role
You must be available to work either the 1st - 5th August OR 15th - 19th August The role will be Monday to Friday, 09:00 - 17:00 Salary will be paid into your bank account upon completion of the placement
DON'T FORGET: AWESOME GRAD OPPORTUNITIES COMING UP! Career Skills Sessions with Goldman Sachs South & Central London - 18th, 19th, 20th July (Tickets) North & Central London - 21st July (Tickets) North London - 22nd July (Tickets) Celebrate your HeadStart achievements at Get Ahead 5th August (Tickets here!)
Any questions? Email matthew.keable@the-challenge.org Good luck in your interview!
Copyright Â© The Challenge, All rights reserved.
You are receiving this email because you are a HeadStart participant.
